    E

    enableCommand(int) - Method in class classes.angryState
    Enables commands only if they are gift or play.
    enableCommand(int) - Method in class classes.Commands
    Enables the specified command so the player can use it.
    enableCommand(int) - Method in class classes.deadState
    Enables the given command.
    enableCommand(int) - Method in class classes.defaultState
    Enables the given command.
    enableCommand(int) - Method in class classes.hungryState
    Enables a specific command.
    enableCommand(int) - Method in class classes.sleepState
    Enables the given command while in sleep state.
    enableCommand(int) - Method in interface classes.State
    Enables a specific command while in this state.
    enableState() - Method in class classes.angryState
    Activates the angry state by disabling all commands, except for gift and play, which are allowed.
    enableState() - Method in class classes.deadState
    Activates the dead state by disabling all possible pet commands.
    enableState() - Method in class classes.defaultState
    Enables all commands and logs that the pet has returned to its normal state.
    enableState() - Method in class classes.hungryState
    Enables all commands and outputs a message.
    enableState() - Method in class classes.sleepState
    Puts the pet into sleep mode and disables all commands.
    enableState() - Method in interface classes.State
    Applies logic specific to entering the current state.
    equipItem(int) - Method in class classes.Shop
    Equips an owned decor item.
    exercise() - Method in class classes.Commands
    Exercises the pet, increasing health while reducing hunger and sleep.
